name: The Wolf Base
description:
Use WASD to walk (arrow keys work but are buggy)

Space to shoot

Find the power ups and get to the end!

Criteria:

Stealth: try not to get seen by the wolves.

Purple: the darkness is purple, that's where enemies won't see you!

Jump: Jumping is the core mechanic of the game

Wham! Sounds: Sound effects show when you're making noise, enemies might hear you!

The game has a lot of bugs we didn't have time to fix, sorry!
